meanings.definition: To determine the strength or biological activity of a substance by testing it on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Scientists bioassayed the new drug on mice to see its effects.
meanings.sent2: The researchers bioassayed the soil samples to measure the toxicity levels.
meanings.sent3: The bioassayed fish seemed to dance after being exposed to the chemical.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was bioassayed by the challenges she faced.
meanings.sent5: The bioassayed plants glowed with health under the microscope.

meanings.sent1: The bioassayed results confirmed the effectiveness of the treatment.
meanings.sent2: She carefully recorded the bioassayed data in her lab notebook.
meanings.sent3: The bioassayed report was accidentally shredded by the cat.
meanings.sent4: His bioassayed experiment was the highlight of the science fair.
meanings.sent5: The bioassayed sample was securely stored in the freezer for future analysis.
